definition: taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Has the special rich fragrance, the feeling in the mouth like abalone, extremely lubricates tastily .
sentences.chinese: 有特別的濃香，口感如鮑魚，極潤滑爽口。

sentences.english: Taste mellow and deep, rich wine, lingering aftertaste and balance.
sentences.chinese: 口感醇厚深邃，酒香濃郁，回味綿長而均衡。

sentences.english: It had significant difference compared with the lactic acid bacteria fermented soybean milk.
sentences.chinese: 與乳酸菌發酵豆乳相比，口感有明顯的區別。

sentences.english: They're often tasted dry instead of being acidic, with good structured and restrained personality.
sentences.chinese: 口感通常較幹但不會過酸，酒體結構出色，風格收斂。

sentences.english: Ample and complex on the palate. It reveals fresh and generous fruit.
sentences.chinese: 口感飽滿複雜，帶有濃郁的新鮮水果味。

sentences.english: Colourful pearls obtained under the processing conditions were featured by proper hardness and softness and low shrinkage.
sentences.chinese: 在此工藝條件下製得的彩珠口感適中，收縮率低。

sentences.english: But a lot of Asians want that taste to linger.
sentences.chinese: 但很多亞洲人希望長久回味這一口感。

sentences.english: A soft mouth-feel with creaminess and crisp tropical fruit flavors.
sentences.chinese: 清爽的熱帶果味與乳脂般的柔和口感達到完美平衡。

sentences.english: The prior preserved fruit has poor taste due to more stones and less flesh.
sentences.chinese: 現有果脯食品核多肉少，口感不佳。

sentences.english: Ripe and mature-tasting pear and apple flavors , some spicy notes mixed in .
sentences.chinese: 略帶桃，蘋果香，口感成熟豐厚，回味複雜濃烈。

sentences.english: The sensory properties of mulberry wine were its soft taste and strong and mellow aroma.
sentences.chinese: 桑椹酒感官特徵爲醇香濃郁，口感柔和。

sentences.english: Ricotta cheese in cream sauce with the thinly sliced potato.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯和法式白醬加上口感濃郁的瑞卡達起司。

sentences.english: Firm mouth. Structured ready to drink wine.
sentences.chinese: 口感結實，結構嚴密，是一款適飲酒。

sentences.english: Pale yellow with green lights. Firm with green apple and lemon flavors. Spicy notes on the finish.
sentences.chinese: 色澤淡黃泛青，口感呈蘋果和檸檬香，回味濃烈。

sentences.english: Youthful palate with plummy -like fruit, balanced by firm but accessible tannins.
sentences.chinese: 口感新鮮，水果味出衆，單寧優良。

sentences.english: Our order included breast meat, usually the least tasty part of the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 我們的餐單包括雞脯肉，通常是雞口感最差的部分。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
